name: Axis Lock
description:
A simple game where you roll around trying to slot yourself and your little dice friends into place. Experience your dice's journey through a mystical world in an attempt to satisfy his quest for adventure.
Both WASD and ← ↑ → ↓ can be used to control your dice. Space is used to split. If you get stuck you can press R at any time to restart.

Created by:

  • DonWippo (Level Design)
  • Jdbener (Programming)
  • ChilledBill (UI Programming)
  • Joce (Technical Art)
  • Krone  (3D Art)
  • Merodi (2D Art)

Audio provided by Nicolas Jeudy / DARK FANTASY STUDIO.

(Sometimes the game will not register that all dice are in position, wiggling a little bit usually fixes this)
